The Alley Games & Bowling Center is available for open play to the general public as well. Gutter bumpers are available for children. Call the staff at 312-413-5170 for availability and more information.  *Holiday hours will be posted in advance.       Google Maps image     The Alley   750 S. Halsted,  Student Center East,  Chicago,  Illinois  60607    Phone: (312) 413-5170  Email: thealley@uic.edu         Bowling Hours       Day  Time      Sunday - Thursday  Noon - 10:00 pm    Friday - Saturday  Noon - Midnight         Billiards Hours       Day  Time      Sunday - Thursday  Noon - 10:00 pm    Friday - Saturday  Noon - Midnight             Bowling & Billiards           Hours    Rates and Reservations    Specials
